basic_info.description: I'm Aaron, a committed and ambitious full stack developer holding a Master's degree in Computer Science, with a specialization in React and Angular-based projects. My expertise extends across various industries, such as entertainment, energy, and financial services, where I have consistently demonstrated my ability to construct inventive solutions. I thrive as a proactive problem-solver, possessing a natural inclination to take ownership of my work assignments. Fueled by a passion for overcoming challenges and delivering top-notch results, I am eagerly seeking fresh opportunities to add value and further advance my professional journey.

projects.title: Kiija
projects.description: As a part-time tutor, a common issue I face when helping students overcome learning challenges related to mathematics specifically is sourcing practice excerises to drill against. Online resources are either paywalled or are found in pdf files that are difficult to interact with in a virtual setting. Kiija is a solution to my teaching problem and is designed to help students learn by repitition and practice without all of the messy overhead. Currently I only support Addition and Subtraction but am actively working on adding Mulitplication, Division, and Alegbra topics. Additional future work will involve expanding subject coverage to Geometry, Calculus, and more!

projects.title: Time Tracker
projects.description: This project is a To-Do app created for the purpose of helping me manage my tasks through the day and keep track of my allocated time per task to help improve productivity.

projects.title: Transaction Dispute
projects.description: A full stack excercise to standup a bank dispute module in React with apis written in my language of choice (Node.js). Done in quick turnaround as an interview assignment.
